main event: A witness sighted a bright, cylindrical, rotating, metallic object hovering in the sky near Selma, California.
interesting points: The object was sighted for about 10 minutes and appeared to be twice the size of a B-52 bomber.
The witness's 11-year-old sister also saw the object.
The object made no sound and disappeared rapidly in a zig-zag motion.
The witness was close to an airport at the time of the sighting.
This was the witness's first report of the sighting.
photographs: no, the report does not include any photographs
